It boosts me to $19, allowing me to buy "The Drunkard" for $4 and potentially a Celestial pack, which I really want to see with Telescope. My deck has 14 non-black cards. The World would reduce that to 11.
Okay, Temperance is *strong* because I'm low on cash ($8). $11 brings me to $19, allowing me to comfortably buy Drunkard and potentially a Jupiter from a future pack.

"Temperance" will give me guaranteed resources. I need to get those Jupiter cards because I have Telescope. I'll need rerolls for those packs. This is a "must-win" scenario. Gambling isn't it.

Wheel of Fortune? A gamble.
World/Moon? Deck fixing. Nope.
Temperance is the most reliable choice to enable more shop actions.
